summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Southwest Andover St. from 56th Ave. Southwest to Aikins Ave. Southwest; and certain other streets, avenues and an easement; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18797 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
